thread.title: Twitter Names Jack Dorsey CEO
thread.title_full: Twitter Names Jack Dorsey CEO - WSJ

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: Twitter Names Jack Dorsey CEO
text:
Twitter Inc. on Monday said it has chosen Jack Dorsey, the companyâ€™s original chief executive who returned to become interim CEO in June, to continue leading the messaging service.
Twitter announced the move in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission. In the filing, Twitter said Mr. Dorsey would relinquish the chairman post, which he has held since October 2008.
Removing interim from his CEO title sets up a... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
